modShortDescription: This modlet adds recipes to crafting for components such as: Electronic Parts, Mechanical Parts, Steel Parts, barbedWireSheet, Scrap Polymers and more.
modDescription:
This modlet adds recipes to crafting for components such as: Electronic Parts, Mechanical Parts, Steel Parts, barbedWireSheet, Scrap Polymers, Nail, toolAndDieSet, Electric Parts, smallEngine, toolBeaker, Sewing Kit. Perfect for changing recipes, and complicating the game, on servers.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vSNi18VloeWfeJSvW7JAbDzRkx8Z-lgu/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** [KronaS](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/kronas/)
